Name:
  Dark Soldier Rework
Version:
  1.4
Description:
  Reworked versions of "Dark Soldier for Valyria Tear" by Stephen Challener (Redshrike)
  for Stendhal.
Details:
  - Orientation: orthogonal
    - N/E/S/W format for Stendhal.
    - Will eventually add S/W/E/N format for RPG Maker & RPGBoss.
  - Dimensions: 48x64
  - Animation:
    - idle (center frames)
    - walking: 12 frames (3 per direction)
    - Animated preview @ 150ms delay.
  - PNG images optimized with indexed color (smaller files).
  - GIMP sources (.xcf) use RGB color.
